text: Akadakhala kuti Mulungu anali kulanga anthu msanga chifukwa cha zoipa zawo, palibe cholengedwa ndi chimodzi chomwe chimene Iye akadachisiya ndi moyo. Koma Iye amawasunga mpaka tsiku lokhazikitsidwa, ndipo ngati nthawi yawo ikwana, ngakhale ndi kamphindi kochepa, iwo sangaichedwetse kapena kuifulumizitsa
